title: Watermelon granita with lemon cream
ingredients: ['Granita', '160ml water', '135g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '5 leaves fresh mint', '1 lime, juiced', '1 pinch coarse sea salt', '285g cubed, seeded watermelon', 'Lemon cream', '225g labneh (thick Lebanese-style yogurt)', '1 tablespoon honey, or to taste', '1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste', '1/2 lemon, zested', '3 tablespoons water, or as needed']
